author: nitinbps
body: If a module has a DSC resource with the same name as the one from built-in DSC resources (from PSDesiredstateConfiguration) module, Powershell fails to compile DSC configuraiton.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @nitinbps could you please add repro steps?

comments.author: HemantMahawar
comments.body: @nitinbps I believe this issue was resolved in DSC layer. Can you validate and close? /cc: @grayzu

comments.author: nitinbps
comments.body: @HemantMahawar @grayzu  Yes, this issue is resolved in DSC layer. Closing the issue.

title: Import-DscResource cannot override built-in DSC resources.
